categories: Category:Articles with an excess of redlinks

nodes.text: "The Sand Will Provide" is a canon mini-comic that published in Star Wars 37 as a bonus story. It was written by Jason and Dash Aaron and illustrated by Andrea Sorrentino.

On Tatooine, two Imperial stormtroopers encountered a young Tusken Raider and debated what to do with them. Suddenly, an old man took the child. The old man left the child at their home. In his journals, the man, Obi-Wan "Old Ben" Kenobi, wrote that everyone needs a little help sometimes.
